entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: A government-like institution for wizards and witches in the story.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: An adult wizard who is a friend or acquaintance of Harry.

relationships.description: Harry had expected the Ministry of Magic to be located in an impressive location, but instead it is located in a telephone box.
